CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 11, 1952, pg. 16, reads: "AME Leaders At Pittsburgh Confab - A large group of leaders attended the Pittsburgh Annual Conference in Bethel AME Church in Pittsburgh last week. The cameraman caught this group during one of the sessions on Friday, Oct. 3.  Left to right: the REv. J. Walker Storms, C.N. Thompson, both presiding elders; Bishop H. Thomas Primm, who will sail soon for South Africa; Bishop S.J. Allen, who presided over the conference; Dr. B.M. McLinn, presiding elder, and Dr. V.C. Hodges of the American Bible Society, who resides in Cleveland, Ohio. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Rev. J. Walker Storms, Rev. C.N. Thompson, Bishop H. Thomas Primm, Bishop S.J. Allen, Dr. B.M. McLinn, and Dr. V.C. Hodges, posed in Bethel AME Church for annual conference
